get.summary: Returns all transactions from a block, or an address (only one source at a time).

parameters.name: block
parameters.description: 32-character hex string which univocally identifies a block.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description:
Address to get transactions from. When selecting by address, unconfirmed
           transactions are included.

parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.description:
Results page number to select; starts in zero. Page size is configurable via
           appsettings.json and command line. By default, page size is 10 transactions. See TransactionsByAddressPageSize key.

get.summary: Returns all transactions from a set of addresses.

parameters.name: paymentAddresses
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of addresses. For BCH, cashaddr format is accepted.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Results selection starting point; first item is 0 (zero). Default to said value.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Results selection ending point. Default to 10.

post.summary: Returns all transactions from a set of adresses.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: See GetTxsForMultipleAddressesRequest DTO.

balance.description: Current wallet balance in coin units.

totalReceived.description: Total amount of money received from the beginning of the chain, in coin units.

totalSent.description: Total amount of money sent from this wallet, from the beginning of the chain, in coin units.

unconfirmedBalance.description: Balance computed considering only the currently unconfirmed transactions involving this address, in coin units.

txApperances.description: Amount of distinct transactions (i.e. don't count the same tx more than once) involving this address.

addrStr.description: Address string; for BCH, it can be in cashaddr format.

transactions.description: Selected transaction ids (using from and to parameters) from the full history.

unconfirmedTxAppearances.description: Current amount of distinct unconfirmed transactions involving this address.

amount.description: Total unspent money for this output, in coin units.

height.description: Height of the block which contains the transaction which contains this utxo.

satoshis.description: Total unspent money for this output, in Satoshis.

confirmations.description: For the block which contains this output.

vout.description: Total unspent money for this output, in Satoshis.

addrs.description: Comma-separated list of addresses; for BCH, cashaddr format is accepted.

isMainChain.description: True if and only if this block belongs to the main chain.

reward.description: Fees earned by the miner who mined this block, in coin units.

difficulty.description: A representation of the computing power which was required to mine this block.

poolInfo.description: Refers to the pool to which the miner belongs (if applies).

chainwork.description: Total amount of hashes expected to be calculated to reach this block height from genesis.

merkleroot.description: Hash of all block transactions (Merkle tree root) as 32-character hex string.

nextblockhash.description: Next block hash as 32-character hex string; for the latest block, this field is left empty.

previousblockhash.description: Previous block hash as 32-character hex string; for the first block (Genesis), this field is left empty.

time.description: Block mining timestamp in Unix format.

confirmations.description: Every block on top of the current one is considered 1 confirmation.

height.description: Block height (Genesis height is considered zero).

GetBlocksByDateResponse.description: Blocks by date result data structure.

time.description: Date when the block was mined, in Unix timestamp format.

txlength.description: Amount of transactions in the block.

isToday.description: True if and only if the block date to search corresponds to today.

more.description: True if and only if the paginated results do not contain all the matching blocks.

currentTs.description: Unix timestamp; marks the end of the search interval.

moreTs.description: Unix timestamp of the first block beyond (i.e. before in the blockchain) the selected interval.

current.description: Search date in configured date input format (default: yyyy-MM-dd).

rawblock.description: Block raw data as hex string.

bestblockhash.description: Hash of the best block (tip) in the longest block chain, as a hex string.

status.description: 200 = success, any other value is considered an error.

data.description: 200 = success, any other value is considered an error.

bitstamp.description: Current price in USD as reported by the Bitstamp service.

testnet.description: True if and only if node is connected to testnet.

connections.description: Current amount of P2P connections established by the Bitprim node.

coin.description: Currency acronym; BTC for Bitcoin, TBTC for Bitcoin Testnet, BCH for Bitcoin Cash, and so on.

network.description: "livenet" for mainnet, given network name for other cases.

timeoffset.description: Offset to apply to UTC times.

syncTipHash.description: Hash of the last block (tip) in the longest block chain, as a hex string.

lastblockhash.description: Hash of the last mined block, as a hex string.

blockChainHeight.description:
Current height of the blockchain (not the local node's copy, but the global value);
"unknown" if this value cannot be obtained at the moment.

height.description: Current height of the node's local copy of the blockchain.

version.description: bitprim-insight API version in semantic versioning notation (major.minor.patch).

connected.description: True if and only if the node is connected to the blockchain's P2P network.

port.description: Port used by the node to communicate with his peers. Null equals the well-known default.

host.description: Node's IP address inside the network.

rawtx.description: Hex string representing the raw transaction to try and broadcast.

txid.description: Transaction hash as 32-character hex string. This will identify it univocally inside the network.

rawtx.description: Transaction representation as a hex string.

txid.description: 32-character hex string which univocally identifies the transaction in the network.

locktime.description: Transaction locktime, expressed as the blockchain height at which the transaction will be considered confirmed.

coinbase.description:
For a coinbase transaction, hex representation of the coinbase script.
For a non-coinbase transaction, this field will be empty.

doubleSpentTxID.description: If this input is a double spend, this will point to the conflicting transaction.

n.description: Zero-based index for the input in the transaction's input set.

sequence.description: Zero-based index for the input in the transaction's input set.

hex.description: Script representation as raw hex data.

pagesTotal.description:
pagesTotal = txCount / pageSize. Page size is configurable via appsettings.json
and command line. See "TransactionsByAddressPageSize" key.

addrs.description: Comma-separated list of addresses; for BCH, cashaddr format is accepted.

from.description: For selecting a subset of the transaction list; starts in zero for the first one.

to.description: For selecting a subset of the transaction list; max value is txCount - 1.

noAsm.description: Choose whether or not to include asm representation of input and output scripts. (1 = include, 0 = don't include)

noScriptSig.description: Choose whether or not to include scriptsig for scripts. (1 = include, 0 = don't include)

noSpend.description: Choose whether or not to include spend information. (1 = include, 0 = don't include)
